chunk:
Biologique Recherche Creme Splendide

Brand: BIOLOGIQUE RECHERCHE

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, GLYCERIN, CETYL ALCOHOL, ACACIA DECURRENS/JOJOBA/SUNFLOWER SEED WAX/POLYGLYCERYL-3 ESTERS, SUCROSE POLYSTEARATE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, NIACINAMIDE, BETULA ALBA BARK EXTRACT, EQUISETUM ARVENSE EXTRACT, HEDERA HELIX (IVY) LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, FUCUS VESICULOSUS EXTRACT, SAMBUCUS NIGRA

ESTERS, SUCROSE POLYSTEARATE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, NIACINAMIDE, BETULA ALBA BARK EXTRACT, EQUISETUM ARVENSE EXTRACT, HEDERA HELIX (IVY) LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, FUCUS VESICULOSUS EXTRACT, SAMBUCUS NIGRA FLOWER EXTRACT, TERMINALIA CATAPPA LEAF EXTRACT, YEAST EXTRACT, RHIZOBIAN GUM, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, TANNIC ACID, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM STEAROYL

EXTRACT, FUCUS VESICULOSUS EXTRACT, SAMBUCUS NIGRA FLOWER EXTRACT, TERMINALIA CATAPPA LEAF EXTRACT, YEAST EXTRACT, RHIZOBIAN GUM, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, TANNIC ACID, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, PVP, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, CHLORPHENESIN

Directions: After cleansing with Biologique milk and applying P50 and your serum, remove Biologique Recherche Creme Splendide from jar with a spatula to avoid bacterial contamination. After emulsifying creme in your hands, apply in upward smoothing movements, starting at decollete and working up.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
